headline: Australia's ACCC will not oppose proposed acquisition of the Interpublic Group of Companies by Omnicom Group
summary: Australia's ACCC: Will not oppose the proposed acquisition of the Interpublic Group of Companies by OMNICOM GROUP Acquisition unlikely to substantially lessen competition in supply of media...

headline: Why Interpublic Group (IPG) Stock Is Up Today
summary: Shares of global advertising conglomerate Interpublic Group (NYSE:IPG) jumped 3.3% in the morning session after its pending acquisition by advertising rival Omnicom Group received a positive update. On its second-quarter earnings call, Omnicom's management confirmed that the acquisition of Interpublic Group (IPG) had received antitrust approval in the United States, a major step forward for the deal. headline: Wall Street Analysts See a 25.84% Upside in Interpublic (IPG): Can the Stock Really Move This High?
summary: The average of price targets set by Wall Street analysts indicates a potential upside of 25.8% in Interpublic (IPG). While the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric is questionable, the positive trend in earnings estimate revisions might translate into an upside in the stock.

headline: Interpublic Group to Report Q2 Earnings: What's in the Offing?
summary: IPG to report Q2 results on July 22, with earnings and revenues expected to decline amid segment weakness.
